title: Ticket #3777: basic_startd_slot_attrs issues
description: The test sometimes fails when one of the condor_status commands fails. Instead of the slot ads which I want to count I get Error: communication error. So I am going to check if I got any results from my condor_status commands and rerun them if I don't get the expected number of lines.
check_ins: 2013-Jul-15 14:11   Check-in [36897]: Turn on tool_debug to try for more info on wht we are getting Error: communication error. #3777 (By Bill Taylor )
